original_text: Therefore the people came to Moses, and said, We have sinned, for we have spoken against the Lord, and against thee; pray unto the Lord, that he take away the serpents from us. And Moses prayed for the people.
korean_text: 백성이 모세에게 이르러 말하되 우리가 여호와와 당신을 향하여 원망함으로 범죄하였사오니 여호와께 기도하여 이 뱀들을 우리에게서 떠나게 하소서 모세가 백성을 위하여 기도하매

sentences.original_text: Therefore the people came to Moses
for we have spoken against the Lord
that he take away the serpents from us
sentences.korean_translation: 그가 뱀을 우리에게서 제하여 달라고 하소서

sentences.original_text: And Moses prayed for the people
